PUBLIC NOTICE The Mercer Area ... PUBLIC NOTICE The Mercer Area School District is accepting bids for a 2009 Chevrolet 10 Passenger van. All bids must be submitted to the District Business Manager, Mike Stabile, Mercer Area School District, 545 West Butler Street, Mercer, PA 16137. The District reserves the right to reject any and all bids, or any part of any bids, and to waive technical defects if, in its judgment, the best interest of the District will be served thereby. Any and all such bid proposals must be submitted on or before July 12, 2023 at 12:00 pm. All bids will be opened publicly at 12:10 pm, July 12, 2023 at the District's Central Office. June 23, 28 & July 5, 2023 PUBLIC NOTICE The Mercer Area School District is accepting bids for a 2009 Chevrolet 10 Passenger van. All bids must be submitted to the District Business Manager, Mike Stabile, Mercer Area School District, 545 West Butler Street, Mercer, PA 16137. The District reserves the right to reject any and all bids, or any part of any bids, and to waive technical defects if, in its judgment, the best interest of the District will be served thereby. Any and all such bid proposals must be submitted on or before July 12, 2023 at 12:00 pm. All bids will be opened publicly at 12:10 pm, July 12, 2023 at the District's Central Office. PUBLIC NOTICE The Midwestern Intermediate Unit IV 453 Maple Street, Grove City, PA 16127 will receive bid quotations for cleaning supplies and equipment. Specifications can be obtained by contacting the Director of Business Services at 724-458-6700 ext. 1202. PUBLIC NOTICE Fictitious Name ... PUBLIC NOTICE Fictitious Name Notice NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN, pursuant to the provisions of The Fictitious Names Act, 54 Pa. C.S. ß 301, et. Seq., as amended, of the filing in the office of the Department of State of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Harrisburg, Pennsylvania on the 21st day of June, 2023, an application for the conduct of a business in Mercer County, Pennsylvania, under the assumed or fictitious name, style or designation of: Wet Paw with its principal place of business at 1314 Slippery Rock Road, Grove City, PA 16127. The name and address of the organization interested in said business is: Country Club Canine Kennels, Inc.,1314 Slippery Rock Road, Grove City, PA 16127.
